name: Princess
ability: On your 1st day, if you nominated & executed a player, the Demon doesn't kill tonight.

legacy.otherNightReminder: If the Princess nominated and successfully executed someone on their first day: The Demon does not act tonight.

nominations.label: Nominate player
nominations.description: On the Princess's 1st day, if they nominated and executed a player, the Demon doesn't kill tonight.

execution.label: Block Demon kill
execution.description: If the Princess nominated and executed a player on their 1st day, the Demon doesn't kill tonight.

information.customMessage: The Demon does not kill tonight.
